availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William D. Jones (Carter County, Kentucky, physician)

body.p: Carter County, Kentucky, physician. Pennsylvania native. Married to Mildred Jones. Father of Thomas Jones. Medical student under A. J. Lansdown in Carter County in 1850. Physician in Carter County in 1860. Engaged B. S. Rice as a medical student in Carter County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, District 1, p. 265B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, p. 260.
Find A Grave, "Dr William D. Jones (1829-1879)," Memorial 146140286, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/146140286 (accessed January 30, 2020).
